1.name: Defensive Stance
1.details:
When Valkyrie damages an enemy Hero, she faces the target regardless of which direction she moves.

In addition, her shield always reduces all incoming damage from the front.

2.name: Impale
2.details: Valkyrie lunges her lance in a straight line, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit and slowing them.

3.name: Guardian Angel
3.details:
Valkyrie quickly positions herself between a target ally Hero and the closest enemy Hero.

She then gains increased armor and magic resist while redirects a percentage of the damage on the target ally to her instead.

4.name: Baptism
4.details: Valkyrie creates a holy field in a target location, healing herself (scaling with magical power) and allied Heroes on top over a duration.

5.name: Skyfall
5.details:
Valkyrie designates a target ally Hero's position as the landing spot, granting that ally a shield (scaling with magical power).

After a delay, Valkyrie soars to the sky and lands at the target location, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and knocking all nearby enemies up.
